# 병합 노리는 트럼프, ‘그린란드 특사’ 임명…덴마크 반발 - 한겨레

[원문 링크](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiggFBVV95cUxOTnlvUU9JRGRTZHFaVjFTSUhraVJyRWJoYkozckhKOWUyZnhvWFNFODRpaDhxQnFjUTI2RThxSGVHSm9QcWI5cmFTMHJlTGdjUWFub1gxbE9xRHVEUjZVa1cycnR5VkdBNU9pMy1jSnlvRmtmU1I1N3I0emhiSXBjc1BR?oc=5)
